entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who is getting her owl and later comes out of the Magical Menagerie with a ginger cat. She is described as glowing when talking about the cat.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who reacts to Hermione's new pet, saying 'You bought that monster?'

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who has an opinion about the cat, thinking it looks grumpy and squashed.

entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Scabbers is Hermione's previous pet rat that is now out of sight.

entities.name: the cat
entities.description: The ginger cat is described as enormous, gorgeous, and grumpy-looking. It is also mentioned to be purring contentedly in Hermione's arms.

relationships.description: Hermione is seen carrying the ginger cat and talking about it, indicating that she owns it.
Ron reacts to Hermione's new pet by saying 'You bought that monster?'
